mapper.sql: SELECT t0.org_code, t0.patient_id, t0.visit_org_name, t0.visit_dept_name, max(t0.visit_dtime) AS visit_dtime, t0.visit_way, t0.doctor_code, t0.resp_doctor_name, t0.diag_code, t0.diag_name FROM user_info t INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.org_code, a.patient_id, a.visit_org_name, a.visit_dept_name, a.visit_dtime, a.visit_way, a.doctor_code, a.resp_doctor_name, c.diag_code, c.diag_name FROM patient_record a LEFT JOIN patient_diag c ON (a.id = c.patient_record_id) ) t0 ON ( t.org_code = t0.org_code AND t.patient_id = t0.patient_id )
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT t0.diag_code AS diagCode, t0.diag_name AS diagName FROM user_info t INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.org_code, a.patient_id, a.visit_org_name, a.visit_dept_name, a.visit_dtime, a.visit_way, a.doctor_code, a.resp_doctor_name, c.diag_code, c.diag_name FROM patient_record a LEFT JOIN patient_diag c ON (a.id = c.patient_record_id) ) t0 ON ( t.org_code = t0.org_code AND t.patient_id = t0.patient_id )
group by t0.org_code, t0.patient_id, t0.doctor_code order by
${paramMap.orderCol}
t0.visit_dtime desc
